text: Xeon is a brand of x86 microprocessors designed and manufactured by Intel Corporation. In 1988 Intel released the first microprocessor using the name Xeon.Andre Kvitka, 'Xeon boosts Intel workstations', InfoWorld, vol. 20, Issue 27 (July 6 1998), p. 97 As of 2021, the Xeon series of processors are used in cloud computing and enterprise grade servers. == References == Category:Computer hardware
title: Xeon
